interactivity.requirements: 20 Miku Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Hormones Running Wild " from Miku Maruyama

progression.synopsis: Sensei approaches Miku , Karin , and Kirin at the soccer field. Miku is tired of waiting for Sensei to say yes to coaching the team, and simply proclaims him the new coach anyway. When Miku mentions the potential for massages, Karin becomes uneasy, but Kirin seems fine with it. To assuage Karin's concerns, Miku asks Sensei if he as any ulterior motives, and Sensei assures them that he "won't touch anyone "how they don't want to be touched". Karin has reservations about that assurance, but Miku and Kirin override her. At Miku's suggestion, they all give Sensei their phone numbers (after some hesitation on Karin's part).

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.6.
